amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities of the Second Class and Villages
amendatorysection.catchline: Overseer of streets; power and duties.
amendatorysection.para: The overseer of streets shall, subject to the order of the board of such village, have general charge, direction and control of all works on streets, sidewalks, culverts and bridges of the village, and shall perform such other duties as the board may direct.
